summary: No one knows why the army base was blown up until the President gets shot there during the memorial service for those killed, but he wasn't the only target.
cast: Mariel Hemingway|Doug Savant|Jenna Leigh Green|Wanda Cannon|Sebastian Spence|Steve Makaj|Andrew Johnston|Michelle Harrison|Dean Wray|Christian Bocher|Gregory Harrison|David Haysom|Ken Tremblett|Linden Banks|Mar Andersons|Jill Teed|Samantha Reimer|Sarah Ezer|Jason Nash|Mike Dopud|Robert Gauvin|Claire Riley|Gerry Nairn|Kelly Dean Sereda|Lindsay Clague|Keath Thome|Nesta Chapman|Artine Tony Browne|Aaron Grain|Daniel O'Leary
title: Objetivo: el presidente
